biotools.summary: CONREL is a genome browser that allows for the exploration of consensus regulatory elements at different levels of abstraction. The total binding affinity of transcription factors on whole consensus region sequences is here fully exploited to characterize and annotate functional properties of regulatory elements. CONREL can be used to explore genomic loci, genes or genomic regions of interest across different cell lines and tissues.
